mapper.select: SELECT UpPhoto.*, food.FOODCAL, food.FOOD_TAN, food.FOOD_DAN, food.FOOD_GI, food.foodweight FROM UpPhoto JOIN normal_mem ON UpPhoto.nnum = normal_mem.nnum JOIN food ON UpPhoto.foodnum = food.FOODNUM WHERE TRUNC(UpPhoto.uploaddate) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND normal_mem.normal_id = #{nnum}
mapper.update: update upphoto set mass = #{mass} where upphotoid = #{upphotoid}
mapper.select: SELECT f.foodweight, f.foodcal, f.food_tan, f.food_dan, f.food_gi FROM food f JOIN upphoto u ON f.foodnum = u.foodnum WHERE u.upphotoid = #{upphotoid}
mapper.insert: insert into imgeditrequest(editrequestid, upphotoid, imgeditcomment, imgedit, editrequeststatus) values(editrequestid_seq.nextval, #{upphotoid}, #{imgeditcomment}, sysdate,'no')
